Articles.Content: Ever since patch 2, the game has been freezing, every time I try to launch anything. First I have to wait for about three minutes for the loading screen to open, then I have to wait for it to finish loading, then after that, it freezes again and I have to wait another three to five minutes. And sometimes it will freeze just randomly.

My hardware is "AMD Ryzen 7 4700u with Radeon graphics 2.00 GHz"

Edited April 14, 2023 by NoKerbalsSky08
I think also going into the map does it.
